name: Space Love (MrTony)
description:
Hi everyone, I present to you my new game. You have to make the highest score! You can post a capture with your scores if you wish: D

  game made with:

-Game Maker Studio 2
-Photoshop
-Blender
-MixCraft 8.1 Home Studio
  Music made with samples from "Shok and Paul Wagorn"
